Uses of Class
com.gsma.services.rcs.JoynService

  • Packages that use JoynService 
    Package Description
    com.gsma.services.rcs.capability
    This API permits to discover capabilities supported by remote contacts.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.chat
    This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.contacts
    This API exposes all infos related to joyn contacts.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.ft
    This API exposes all functionality to transfer files in real time.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.gsh
    This API exposes exposes all functionality related to sharing geolocations during a CS call via the Geoloc Sharing service.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.ipcall
    This API exposes all functionality related to IP voice call and IP video call services.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.ish
    This API exposes exposes all functionality related to transferring images during a CS call via the Image Sharing service.
    com.gsma.services.rcs.session
    This API exposes all functionality to initiate multimedia sessions between two end points based on a dedicated service ID (or feature tag).
    com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh
    This API exposes all functionality related to sharing live video stream during a CS call via the Video Sharing service.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.capability

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.capability 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CapabilityService
      Capability service offers the main entry point to read capabilities of remote contacts, to initiate capability discovery and to receive capabilities updates.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.chat

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.chat 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChatService
      Chat service offers the main entry point to initiate chat 1-1 ang group conversations with contacts.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.contacts

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.contacts 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContactsService
      Contacts service offers additional methods to manage RCS info in the local address book.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.ft

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.ft 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileTransferService
      This class offers the main entry point to transfer files and to receive files.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.gsh

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.gsh 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GeolocSharingService
      This class offers the main entry point to share geolocation info during a CS call.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.ipcall

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.ipcall 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IPCallService
      This class offers the main entry point to initiate IP calls.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.ish

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.ish 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ImageSharingService
      This class offers the main entry point to transfer image during a CS call.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.session

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.session 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MultimediaSessionService
      This class offers the main entry point to initiate and to manage multimedia sessions.

    • Uses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh

      Subclasses of JoynService in com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VideoSharingService
      This class offers the main entry point to share live video during a CS call.
